meanings.definition: To strike or beat with a cudgel.
meanings.sent1: He becudgels the drum to make music.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith becudgels the hot iron to shape it.
meanings.sent3: The chef becudgels the dough to make delicious bread.
meanings.sent4: The waves becudgel the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter becudgels the wood to craft a chair.

meanings.sent1: She becudgels her opponent with strong arguments.
meanings.sent2: The journalist becudgels the corrupt politician in her article.
meanings.sent3: The comedian becudgels the audience with jokes about his own clumsiness.
meanings.sent4: The storm becudgels the city with heavy rain and strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher becudgels the students for not completing their homework.
